profession.title: Skills
profession.skills: My technical toolkit covers modern web development, e-commerce, and creative engineering. Here are the core technologies I use to deliver high-quality solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Explore my background, skills, and links. On desktop, you can drag and move each card freely.

experience.title: Shopify Developer
experience.description: Created and maintained high-performing e-commerce stores for Umbra Digital Company's clients. Specialized in custom themes and Liquid/JavaScript functionalities.

experience.title: Sr. Shopify Developer
experience.description: Led the advancement of PodVapes' e-commerce platform, integrating third-party services and optimizing user experience with Shopify APIs.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Worked on creative web projects, focusing on UI/UX and interactive animations for digital campaigns and client websites.

experience.title: Web Designer
experience.description: Designed and developed visually compelling websites, collaborating closely with designers and developers to deliver high-quality results.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Assisted in building web applications, learning best practices in coding, testing, and deployment in a fast-paced agency environment.

business.name: Remix Digital
business.tagline: Creating exceptional digital experiences that transform brands and drive business growth.
